com.keyboardr.glassremote.client

Interface RemoteMessenger.Callback<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - message type to receive
    Enclosing interface:
    RemoteMessenger<S,R>

    public static interface RemoteMessenger.Callback<M>
    Callback interface for RemoteMessenger. All callbacks will be called on the main thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
      The RemoteMessenger has connected to remoteDevice and is able to send and receive messages
      void onConnectionFailed()
      The RemoteMessenger has failed to connect to any devices.
      void onDisconnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
      The RemoteMessenger has disconnected from remoteDevice and can no longer send or receive messages
      void onReceiveMessage(M message)
      The RemoteMessenger has received a message from the remote server

    • Method Detail

      • onConnected

        void onConnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
        The RemoteMessenger has connected to remoteDevice and is able to send and receive messages
        Parameters:
        remoteDevice - the BluetoothDevice this RemoteMessenger has connected to

      • onConnectionFailed

        void onConnectionFailed()
        The RemoteMessenger has failed to connect to any devices. Messages cannot be sent or received

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
        The RemoteMessenger has disconnected from remoteDevice and can no longer send or receive messages
        Parameters:
        remoteDevice - the BluetoothDevice this RemoteMessenger was connected to

      • onReceiveMessage

        void onReceiveMessage(M message)
        The RemoteMessenger has received a message from the remote server
        Parameters:
        message - the M message received from the remote server
